Uses of Package
com.burstly.conveniencelayer

Packages that use com.burstly.conveniencelayer
com.burstly.conveniencelayer Contains Convience Layer (CL) classes. 
 

Classes in com.burstly.conveniencelayer used by com.burstly.conveniencelayer
BurstlyAnimatedBanner
          AnimatedBanner is used to handle the use case of a banner which is not always visible.
BurstlyAnimatedBanner.IAnimationListener
          Listener for animation events
BurstlyAnimatedBanner.State
          The state of the ad
BurstlyBaseAd
          The BurstlyBaseAd is the base convenience layer wrapper class for all ads.
BurstlyBaseAd.AdType
          The general type of ad unit
BurstlyBaseAd.CachingState
          The state of having a ad cached
BurstlyIntegrationModeAdNetworks
           
IActivityListener
          IActivityListener receives callbacks for onPause, onResume, and onDestroy Activity events
IBurstlyListener
          Burstly Listener receives ad event callbacks
ICacheable
          Interface provides method for caching an ad to be shown later
IFragmentListener
          IFragmentListener receives callbacks for onPause, onResume, and onDestroy Fragment events
